flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Once it begins to rampage, a
GYARADOS will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
They say that during past strife,
GYARADOS would appear and leave
blazing ruins in its wake.
flavor_text_entries.red:
Rarely seen in
the wild. Huge
and vicious, it is capable of
destroying entire
cities in a rage.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
Rarely seen in
the wild. Huge
and vicious, it is capable of
destroying entire
cities in a rage.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Brutally vicious
and enormously
destructive. Known for totally
destroying cities
in ancient times.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
They say that
during past wars,
GYARADOS would appear and leave
blazing ruins in
its wake.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Once it appears,
it goes on a ram­
page. It remains enraged until it
demolishes every­
thing around it.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
It appears when­
ever there is
world conflict, burning down any
place it travels
through.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
When MAGIKARP evolves into GYARADOS,
its brain cells undergo a structural
transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this
POKéMON’s wildly violent nature.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
Once GYARADOS goes on a rampage, its
ferociously violent blood doesn’t calm
until it has burned everything down. There are records of this POKéMON’s
rampages lasting a whole month.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
It is an extremely vicious and violent
POKéMON. When humans begin to fight,
it will appear and burn everything to the
ground with intensely hot flames.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It has an extremely aggressive nature.
The HYPER BEAM it shoots from its mouth
totally incinerates all targets.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious,
it is capable of destroying entire cities
in a rage.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Once it appears, its rage never
settles until it has razed the
fields and mountains around it.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
In ancient literature, there is a
record of a GYARADOS that razed
a village when violence flared.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.
It remains enraged until it
demolishes everything around it.
flavor_text_entries.black:
Once it begins to rampage, a
Gyarados will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Once it begins to rampage, a
Gyarados will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Once it begins to rampage, a
Gyarados will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Once it begins to rampage, a
Gyarados will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.
flavor_text_entries.x:
In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados
that razed a village when violence flared.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is
capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
When Magikarp evolves into Gyarados, its brain cells undergo a
structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to
blame for this Pokémon’s wildly violent nature.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Once Gyarados goes on a rampage, its ferociously violent
blood doesn’t calm until it has burned everything down.
There are records of this Pokémon’s rampages lasting a
whole month.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
A tale is told of a town that angered Gyarados.
Before the sun rose the next day, flames utterly
consumed the town, leaving not a trace behind.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
There are people who swear that any place
Gyarados appears is fated for destruction.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It fires hyper beams in all directions, burning the
surrounding area to ash. There are some regions
where it’s called “the deity of destruction.”
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
The energy from evolution stimulated its brain
cells strongly, causing it to become
very ferocious.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Brutally vicious and enormously destructive.
Known for totally destroying cities in
ancient times.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Brutally vicious and enormously destructive.
Known for totally destroying cities in
ancient times.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It has an extremely aggressive nature.
The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth
totally incinerates all targets.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn
everything down, even in a harsh storm.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
I suspect this Pokémon to be the true identity of a dragon
written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire
village with white-hot beams from its maw.
